description: The Collective Man (Sun, Chang, Ho, Lin, and Han Tao-Yu) is a fictional character, a Chinese superhero in the Marvel Comics universe
name: Collective Man
powers: Ability to temporarily increase the limits these powers by mentally drawing upon outside energy
teleport to each other via psychic/spiritual-link.
Ability to merge into a single being possessing five times the physical
mental ability of a single Tao-Yu brother
teams: Marvel Super Hero Contest of Champions
